phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
But we do not have time today!
Hurry and let me ride you!
We will settle this for sure tomorrow!
So you just wait there until then!
Now do not you go floating away like cotton!
That was a disaster I am speechless.
Just who the hell is he?!
I wonder if Jidanbo is all right?
The wound has closed up, but
Big-bodied men have lots of stamina.
I am sure he will be okay.
He is so big and so strong.
I am sure he will be okay.
Who is this Kukaku Shiba we are going to meet now?
Yoruichi never gives us any details
It is probably someone he knows
who can get us to Seireitei without passing through the gates, right?
Probably, someone who is famous for his skill.
It must be a cat with pedigree papers!
Or an American Short Hair or a Dalmatian.
It does not mean it will be a cat just because Yoruichi knows him.
he is probably a well-built man, someone like a samurai.
No, he will be an old hermit-type master.
A hermit-like macho samurai with cat ears, and a tail!
I cannot tell what you drew
Then how about a skinny guitar-wielding samurai?
He has to have a cape.
Now then, I have to think up the next Kukaku Shiba!
Noyou do not have to think.
I am going to finish the fight with that guy from yesterday!
He will think I ran away!
Help me drag this fool away from here!
I am going to beat him up quickly as soon as he shows up,
and I will come after you, so go on-!
Has blood gone to your head and made you forget your purpose here?
Rukia's life depends on this journey.
You cannot waste time just to see who is more stubborn!
Did they move up my execution date?
It is less than 14 days to the execution.
The use of Sokyoku has been granted.
You are being transferred to Shishinro, Repentance Cell.
Looks like we have come to the edge of a village.
Are you sure this is the right way?
According to the map the Elder gave us,
it is supposed to be around here.
If you have any complaints, you take the lead!
Kukaku Shiba probably wants to keep his identity a secret,
that is why he lives in a place like this.
Unfortunately, that is not the case.
It is just that person's nature and personal preference.
This person moves around quite a bit,
but the house is always built the same.
Once you see it, you will recognize it.
You can recognize it at once.
That is not the problem anymore!
Wants to keep his identity a secret?
He is probably not allowed to live in town
because he builds houses like that!
That is got to be it!
So this time, it is human arms holding the banner.
Arghwe're going to that embarrassing house right now?!
I do not want to be seen walking into a house like that!
I know you do not want to go, but hurry up!
What is that supposed to mean?
It is awfully big compared to the house.
It looks like the opening is closed up.
And one is a Soul Reaper!
will not allow you to pass!
will not allow you to pass!
Or you will die right here!
What a pain this Soul Society is!
A descending stairway as soon as you enter?
I wonder how you get upstairs?
We did not know it was you, Yoruichi, and your companions.
It is my fault for not notifying you beforehand.
Such generous words from such a great personage!
It is been a while, Yoruichi.
I never said it was a man.
I have a favor to ask of you.
That is usually the case when you look me up.
It is been a long time since we have talked like this
Tell me, I love difficult things.
The two tools which will be used for your execution.
A prisoner who is held in this tower
can look out the window that has been placed in the tower,
and gaze out at the Sokyoku and repent his sins.
That is why this is called the Repentance Cell.
Thank you for transferring the prisoner here.
You already heard that there were Ryoka in Soul Society yesterday?
And one of them wielded a sword as long as his body.
A Soul Reaper with orange-colored hair.
I see I get the picture.
All right, I will take on the job.
If Urahara is involved, I cannot refuse even if I wanted to.
However, while I trust you I do not trust those kids.
I will include my henchman to keep an eye on them.
Henchman, but he is actually my kid brother.
He is still a brat and not that useful.
I am opening the door, so behave!
How many days has it been since I saw her face looking so alive?
Ichimaru was the one who confronted them,
so that kid probably is not alive.
I was probably right not to tell her.
Hey, it is been awhile, Abarai.
It is been quite some time since we talked like this.
Since you were sent to Kenpachi's place.
How many years has it been?
You are with the Squad 6 now?
Errwhat did you want to talk to me about?
Abarai, you and her you were close to Rukia Kuchiki, right?
I heard you were chums from the old days in Rukon District.
I will not waste any time then.
In your eyes, should she die?
No I do not understand your question.
Do not you think it is strange?
Her crime was the unauthorized transfer, and loss, of her spiritual energy,
and staying longer than allowed outside.
Certainly, heavy crimes, but the problem is how to deal with them.
The order for immediate return and disposal of her Gigai.
The lessening of the grace period from 35 days to 25 days,
and the use of the Sokyoku on one who is ranked below a captain.
They are all outside the norm.
I have a feeling that this is the will of one person.
An urgent meeting will now be held!
Did she have to go that far to stop them?
I think I know why she always moves.
Fighting from the minute you set eyes on each other
Do not you know it is dangerous?!
If you have a problem about the way I do things, get outta here!
Koganehiko, go outside with Shiroganehiko and start the preparations.
The rest, be quiet and follow me!
Wowwhy is there light when we are underground?
I did not see any generators.
I keep hotaru-kazura in the ceiling cracks and
on both sides of the wooden frames.
Is that a plant or something that is only found in Soul Society?
I will shoot you guys into Seireitei with this.
I am the best pyrotechnic in Rukongai!
send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
I was casually walking through town
Around the time dusk fell and the city was bathed in red
It was an afternoon with crowds of people coming and going
I do not know why but I just stood there and watched
Then my cell phone started to vibrate and I made myself move
hoping it could fill in this hole in my heart
We got to hold each other up
I send a rhapsody filled with treasured thoughts
To the people who have always held me up.
Ill always be grateful for who you are.
This is the Special Hard Spiritual Partition Penetration Device
which my sister invented that can break through the barrier
and which is made from the Sekki-Seki
which breaks down spiritual energy completely.
